item.title: Building a Discord bot: A definitive guide
item.description:
In this guide, I will be building a Discord bot from scratch using only discord.js and a few open public APIs. I’ll also explain each step and discuss the reason for preference of a particular way of implementation over others. Unlike other “recipes” on the web, this will give you insight into the workflow of building software.

This may seem like a long post because it is. I suggest you to follow along in chunks so you don’t get overwhelmed. The tutorial is divided into chapters. So, let’s get started.
